title: Print, 1921-6-228-4, ca. 1788
inscribed:
Imprinted from lower left to lower left center: Medaille Antique et une Cineraire du Museum du Vatican//Aubert P. fecit.
Imprinted lower center: Vase compose, pose sur un Autel Antique qui se voit au Palais de la ville 
Lower right: Cistre et Lampe/Sepulchre
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At center is a large vase upon a pedestal flanked by a small medal and vase on the left and a smaller vase with other objects on the right
